item.description:
Weather permitting, we will go for a bike ride from the Odiorne  State Park to Hampton Beach.   Depending on how long it will take us to get to  Hampton Beach, we will   either have lunch at The Ashworth or spend some time on the beach then have lunch. Once well rested, we will head back to Odiorne.    This event is meant more to have fun than to get a workout, but you will need to be in somewhat of a good shape since we will bike quite a few miles, and the return trip will be on a bit of an uphill incline.    I thought that we would bike with many breaks/stops along the way.    If time allows, and/or people feel up to it, we can then ride in the Odiorne park, which has amazing views.

We will meet at 10:00 am at the second  park entrance, coming from the south, which is on Route 1A in Rye NH.    There is a parking fee for this lot.    Any types of bikes can be used for this event.   If interested in car pooling, please post a comment, when you sign up, and we’ll try to arrange something.

Please remember to bring your sunscreen, insect repellent and plenty of fluids.

 I hope to see you there.

 

Carpooling options.  Because this event is so far out of our area, it may be a good idea if some of us car pool, and offer to bring others’ bike, if we can.   I have room for one bike on my bike rack, first call first served.   If you want to offer to bring someone’s bike, all you have to do is enter a comment to that effect along with your cell phone number.   This way you can be contacted for arrangements.

Please RSVP or call my cell @ 603-247-0897

 

Location:  Odiorne State Park(second entrance if coming from the south)
item.how_to_find_us: Look for a white Toyota Corolla

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: Bike Ride and lunch on the seacoast
